description: I am unable to access my account despite entering the correct credentials. Please assist in resetting my password.
I have been charged twice for my subscription this month. Can you please look into this and process a refund?
I would like to request a new feature that allows users to export data in CSV format directly from the dashboard.
The reporting module is not displaying the correct data for the current month. Please investigate this issue.
Our team is unable to access the API endpoints. We are receiving a 403 Forbidden error. Please advise.
We need to update the user permissions for our team. Some users are unable to access the admin panel.
There seems to be an issue with data synchronization between our CRM and your platform. The records are not updating correctly.
One of our users is experiencing difficulties logging in. The system keeps showing an invalid login attempt message.
The application has been running very slow over the past week. It takes a long time to load pages and execute actions.
We are trying to integrate your platform with a third-party app but are encountering connection errors. Please help.
We would like to downgrade our subscription from Premium to Basic. Please guide us through the process.
Notification emails are not being sent to our users. This issue started happening after the recent update.
I encountered an error while trying to generate an invoice. The system crashes and shows a 500 Internal Server Error.
Can you assist with changing the primary email address associated with our account? The current one is outdated.
Our team is unable to upload files to the document library. We receive an error message saying the file format is not supported.
The dashboard analytics are not updating in real-time. We need accurate data for our weekly reports.
Is it possible to customize the user interface to match our company's branding? We need to change the color scheme.
We are experiencing issues with user session timeouts. Users are being logged out too quickly, even while active.
I have noticed discrepancies in the usage reports. The numbers do not match our internal tracking data.
We need assistance with setting up multi-factor authentication for enhanced security. Can you provide guidance?
